tool_description: Machine-Learning based skin analysis services for cosmetic dermatology. Visit skinhelpdesk.com for details and instructions.
name: skinhelpdesk
title: skinhelpdesk

api_list.name: Skin Blemish API
api_list.description: This API estimates and names the colour of the blemishes on the skin.  Useful for **MELASMA** evaluation. NOT FOR CLINICAL/MEDICAL USE. ![](https://skinhelpdesk.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/pigmentation.png)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skinhelpdesk.p.rapidapi.com/shdmap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skinhelpdesk.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Acne Grading and Counting
api_list.description:
![](https://skinhelpdesk.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/acnode.png.png)
Detects and **counts acne subtypes** such as comedones and papulopustular lesions and gives an overall grading along with **boxed lesions** as above. NOT FOR CLINICAL/MEDICAL USE.

api_list.name: Skin Tone Estimation
api_list.description:
![](https://skinhelpdesk.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/skin-color.png)
Estimates the skin tone (**skin color**) of a submitted image in individual typology angle (ITA). It also calculates erythema (redness) and cyanosis (blueness). Please minimize non-skin pixels in the submitted image. NOT FOR CLINICAL/MEDICAL USE.

api_list.name: Skin Movement Estimation
api_list.description:
![](https://skinhelpdesk.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/skinmesh.png)
Estimates **facial movements** from distance between key landmarks. Suitable for assessing the effect/requirement of botulinum toxin (**BOTOX**). 
NOT FOR CLINICAL/MEDICAL USE.

api_list.name: Hair density assessment for laser evaluation
api_list.description: Estimates approximate **density of hair** by pixel counting. Suitable for assessing the effect/requirement of **LASER HAIR REMOVAL**. NOT FOR CLINICAL/MEDICAL USE. ![](https://skinhelpdesk.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/shdhair.jpg)
